description: This file defines API endpoints for managing expense transactions in a financial backend system, including creating, listing, and deleting expenses, with dependencies on FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and Pydantic.

classes.name: ExpenseCreate
classes.description: Pydantic model for expense creation payload, including date, amount, category, and optional description.

methods.name: TransactionSchema create_expense( payload: ExpenseCreate, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: API endpoint to create a new expense transaction for the authenticated user.

methods.name: list[TransactionSchema] list_expenses( db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], month: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1, le=12, description="Month number (1-12)"), year: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1900, le=9999, description="Year (e.g., 2025)"), category: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by category (exact match)"), )
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve a list of expense transactions filtered by optional month, year, and category.

methods.name: Response delete_expense( id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: API endpoint to delete an expense transaction by ID, only if owned by the current user.

ctags.name: amount
ctags.pattern: /^    amount: float = Field(..., description="Expense amount (positive number)")$/

ctags.name: category
ctags.pattern: /^    category: str = Field(..., description="Category for the expense (e.g., Groceries)")$/

ctags.name: create_expense
ctags.signature: ( payload: ExpenseCreate, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )

ctags.name: delete_expense
ctags.signature: ( id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )

ctags.name: list_expenses
ctags.signature: ( db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], month: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1, le=12, description="Month number (1-12)"), year: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1900, le=9999, description="Year (e.g., 2025)"), category: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by category (exact match)"), )
